casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

July 19, 2010

[Cite as 07/19/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-3347.]

RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

2010-0983. Lyndhurst v. Di Fiore.

Cuyahoga App. No. 93270, 2010-Ohio-1578. On motion for reconsideration. Motion granted, and appeal is reinstated for consideration of the jurisdictional memoranda by the court.
